languages.text: "Не просто. Видите ли, знающие люди при помощи сложных ритуалов и правильных инструментов, могут превратить грязный синий камушек из недр Тассеры в нечто совершенно особенное. Впрочем, вам это знание уже ни к чему".

traits.locale_text: "Не просто. Видите ли, тассерций — сильнейший псифокус. Впрочем, вам это знание уже ни к чему".

languages.text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."
languages.original_text: "Не просто. Видите ли, знающие люди при помощи сложных ритуалов и правильных инструментов, могут превратить грязный синий камушек из недр Тассеры в нечто совершенно особенное. Впрочем, вам это знание уже ни к чему".

traits.locale_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

"Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

"Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

"Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

"Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

"Much more. You see, knowledgeable people, by means of complex rituals, can transform a dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

"Much more. You see, with the right knowledge and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

languages.text: “一点都没错。如你所见，只要掌握正确的知识，拥有合适的工具，了解某些复杂的仪式，就可以将塔瑟拉深处随处可见的蓝石头变为真正的不同凡响之物。不过，就算你现在知道了这些，恐怕也为时已晚。”
languages.original_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错。如你所见，只要掌握正确的知识，拥有合适的工具，了解某些复杂的仪式，就可以将塔瑟拉深处随处可见的蓝石头变为真正的不同凡响之物。不过，就算你现在知道了这些，恐怕也为时已晚。”

languages.text: «Mucho más. Verá, con el conocimiento adecuado, las herramientas necesarias y unos rituales complejos, la gente puede convertir un sencillo guijarro azulado extraído de las profundidades de Thassera en algo muy especial, pero ya es tarde para que pueda sacar provecho de esta información».
languages.original_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

traits.locale_text: «Mucho más. Verá, con el conocimiento adecuado, las herramientas necesarias y unos rituales complejos, la gente puede convertir un sencillo guijarro azulado extraído de las profundidades de Thassera en algo muy especial, pero ya es tarde para que pueda sacar provecho de esta información».

languages.text: "Hem de hiç değil. Gördüğün gibi doğru bilgiler, doğru alet edevat ve karmaşık ayinler sonucunda insanlar; Thassera'nın derinliklerindeki ufacık, pis, mavi bir taşı gerçekten özel bir şeye dönüştürebilir. Ancak bu bilgiden faydalanmak için biraz geç kaldın."
languages.original_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

traits.locale_text: "Hem de hiç değil. Gördüğün gibi doğru bilgiler, doğru alet edevat ve karmaşık ayinler sonucunda insanlar; Thassera'nın derinliklerindeki ufacık, pis, mavi bir taşı gerçekten özel bir şeye dönüştürebilir. Ancak bu bilgiden faydalanmak için biraz geç kaldın."

languages.text: 「それ以上だ。いいか、正しい知識、正しい工具といくつかの複雑な儀式があれば、タッセーラの深部から出てきたただの汚れた青い小石を、本当に特別なものに変えることができる。しかし、その情報で何かをするには少し遅い」
languages.original_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

traits.locale_text: 「それ以上だ。いいか、正しい知識といくつかの複雑な儀式があれば、タッセーラの深部から出てきたただの汚れた青い小石を、本当に特別なものに変えることができる。しかし、その情報で何かをするには少し遅い」

languages.text: « Bien plus. Voyez-vous, quiconque possède les connaissances et les outils requis et effectue quelques rituels complexes peut transformer un simple caillou bleu issu des profondeurs de Thassera en quelque chose de véritablement exceptionnel. Mais je doute que cette information vous soit d'une quelconque utilité, désormais. »
languages.original_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

traits.locale_text: « Bien plus. Voyez-vous, quiconque possède les connaissances et les outils requis et effectue quelques rituels complexes peut transformer un simple caillou bleu issu des profondeurs de Thassera en quelque chose de véritablement exceptionnel. Mais je doute que cette information vous soit d'une quelconque utilité, désormais. »

languages.text: "Sehr viel mehr. Mit dem richtigen Wissen, dem richtigen Werkzeug und einigen komplexen Ritualen kann man ein einfaches blaues Steinchen aus den Tiefen von Thassera in etwas wirklich Besonderes verwandeln. Aber mit dieser Information könnt Ihr jetzt nichts mehr anfangen."
languages.original_text: "Much more. You see, with the right knowledge, the right tools, and some complex rituals, people can transform a simple, dirty blue pebble from the depths of Thassera into something truly special. However, it's a bit late for you to do anything with that information."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr viel mehr. Mit dem richtigen Wissen, dem richtigen Werkzeug und einigen komplexen Ritualen kann man ein einfaches blaues Steinchen aus den Tiefen von Thassera in etwas wirklich Besonderes verwandeln. Aber mit dieser Information könnt Ihr jetzt nichts mehr anfangen."
